You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

Dataset: webnlg

Data: ['Olga_Bondareva | birthPlace | Leningrad,_USSR', 'Olga_Bondareva | birthName | "Olga Nikolaevna Bondareva"', 'Olga_Bondareva | deathDate | 1991-12-09', 'Olga_Bondareva | professionalField | Economics', 'Olga_Bondareva | professionalField | Mathematics']
Output:
final_response: Olga Bondareva, whose birth name was Olga Nikolaevna Bondareva, was born in Leningrad, USSR. She worked in the fields of economics and mathematics. Olga Bondareva passed away on December 9, 1991.
